objectives.evil: Slay Helm, or knock him unconscious

specialRules.A Question of Honour: Neither model is wearing armour or using weapons; neither counts as Unarmed
specialRules.The First Punch: Evil starts with Priority; Freca automatically wins the first tied Duel roll
specialRules.Dunlending Fury: Freca increases his Attacks to 3 when he Charges
specialRules.Knockout Blow: If Freca rolls a natural 6 to Wound and the wound is successful, Helm is knocked out
